title: Ep 090: Thanksgiving Wines 2013
description:
From Rosé Champagne to Beaujolais-Villages, we've got a range to recommend to our American friends. Part shameless commerce division (the wines are available on http://vinport.com/wfnp), part food pairing bonanza we've got wines to make your TG more delicious!

 

Here is a list of the wines we mention:

Grüner Veltliner

Châteauneuf-du-Pape Blanc

Alsace Riesling

Rosé Champagne

Super Tuscan Syrah

Beaujolais-Villages

Cahors (mostly Malbec)

 

Have a wonderful Thanksgiving and please let us know how the wines were, especially if you ordered them from Vinport!

 

Thanks for listening!
